title: CGPA CALCULATOR
content: If I am scoring 65/100 including ESA , ISA and assignments what could bey CGPA in physics cycle?

comments.body: Can i roughly get an idea about the CGPA I'll?

If you get roughly 65/100 in your combined score in all courses, that's about a C grade in all courses. That means you'd get around a 7 CGPA. Note that since the credits for each course are different, it might be a little lower or even higher.
